ack.title: EIA, CD, VMC, SAE-K, and AZ conceived, designed, and coordinated the study. AAA, GAA, and ANA were involved in collection of samples from camels and data collection. EIA, SBAM, AMT, SAE-K, AMH, MAM, VMC, and TB did virological testing and sequencing. CD and VMC did phylogenetic analyses. All authors reviewed the data. CD, VMC, EIA, SAE-K, and AZ developed the first draft of the manuscript. All authors contributed to writing and finalising the manuscript and agreed to submit for publication.
